entry.title: African Immortelle Helichrysum Essential Oil | Pure Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Essential Oils
Price: 190.50

Pure Indigenous's African Immortelle Helichrysum Essential Oil (10ml) is a powerful medicinal oil, commonly known by locals as Imphepho. Imphepho is traditionally used as a sedative, to promote respiratory health, deter insects and cleanse your energy and space. 

  • Sedative properties to ease insomnia
  • Soothes headaches and tension
  • Relieves coughs, colds, fever
  • Repels insects through fumigation
  • Improves and heals skin conditions through its antibacterial and antiviral properties
  • Traditionally used in rituals to bring on trance-like and meditative states

Ingredients

  • African Immortelle Helichrysum Essential Oil (Helichrysum Odoratissimum) is derived from the Greek word "helios" meaning sun and "chrysos" meaning gold, referring to the colour of the flowers in this genus. It has been used by the indigenous people throughout time in their rituals, to treat respiratory issues, as well as to induce relaxation and sleep.

Directions for use

Add 3 drops of Africa Helichrysum Essential Oil to a warm bath.

If you'd like to apply it on your skin or hair, add 3 drops of African Helichrysum Essential Oil to 50 ml carrier oil of choice.

To use this oil in an Aromatherapy massage, add 4-6 drops of African Helichrysum Essential Oil to 50 ml carrier oil of choice.

Caution: Essential Oils should not be taken internally. Add to a carrier oil as a massage oil, rub onto temples, use as a burner oil, in the bath or as a steam inhalation. Essential oils are not recommended during pregnancy, breastfeeding or on babies/children.
entry.s:tag: Pure Indigenous Wholesale Distributor South Africa

entry.title: Tranquility Oil Blend - Brings You Peace & Harmony
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 41.50

Pure Indigenous's Tranquility Oil Blend has been created from a selection of South African essential oils mixed in organically certified cold pressed Grape Seed oil to bring you peace and harmony.

  • Encourages relaxation
  • Calming and soothing
  • Relieves physical and mental tension
  • Balances mood
  • Lifts depression, stress, anxiety and anger

Ingredients

  • African Helichrysum Essential Oil (Helichrysum Odoratissimum) is derived from the Greek word "helios" meaning sun and "chrysos" meaning gold, referring to the colour of the flowers in this genus. It has been used by the indigenous people throughout time in their rituals, to treat respiratory issues, as well as to induce relaxation and sleep.
  • African Wormwood Essential Oil (Artemisia Afra), also known as wild wormwood, African wormwood, wilde-als and zengana, is named after the Greek goddess Artemis and is used to promote libido and ease coughs, colds, flu, fever and headaches.
  • Cape Chamomile Essential Oil (Eriocephalus punctulatus) soothes, heals and relaxes the body and mind. It's also a great medicinal treatment for tension in the muscles.
  • Rose Geranium Essential Oil (Pelagonium Graveolens) is known as the poor people’s Rose oil as it is less expensive than the original Rose essential oil. It's been used for centuries as a wound healer, to balance energies, to enhance moods, treat various skin ailments and last but not least, for its aromatic scents.
  • Cape Snowbush Essential Oil (Eriochephalus Africanus), also known as the wild or African rosemary, is native to the Western and Eastern Cape provinces of South Africa and was used by the indigenous people for  emotional conditions such as depression, stress, anxiety and anger, and physical conditions such as coughs, colds/flu, muscular aches and digestion.
  • Cape Grape Seed Oil has been used for thousands of years due to its benefits of toning the skin, protecting against sun damage, and reducing the appearance of blemishes, wrinkles, and stretch marks.

Directions for use

You can use the Tranquility Oil Blend as an Aromatherapy massage oil, to rub onto temples, use as a burner oil, in the bath or as a steam inhalation.

Caution: Essential oils are not recommended during pregnancy, breastfeeding or on babies/children.
entry.s:tag: Pure Indigenous Wholesale Distributor South Africa

entry.title: Imphepho Room Spray - Energy Cleanser & Insect Repellent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 40.00

Pure Indigenous's Imphepho Room Spray (140 ml) contains pure and natural plant fragrances extracted from the Imphepho plant to clear your energy and space. It can also be used as an effective natural insect repellent.

  • Can be used as a room spray OR a body mist
  • Free from parabens, sulfates and alcohol
  • Deters insects
  • Cleanses your energy and space

Ingredients

Imphepho Room Spray is indigenous to and extracted in South Africa, using the most organic and eco-friendly methods and following ingredients:

  • Aqua, also known as distilled water or deionized water, is water that's had its mineral ions removed. Because the majority of water impurities are dissolved salts, once the water has gone through the distillation or deionization process, you're left with high purity water.
  • Imphepho (Helichrysum Odoratissimum) is considered a sacred herb which has been used extensively as an energy protector and cleanser and has been widely used to deter insects from mattresses, cupboards and your immediate environment.

Directions for use

If you're using the Imphepho Room Spray to cleanse your space, you can give a few sprays to the areas you feel need it. Use as often as you feel necessary to clear out your energy or your home's energy. 

You can also use the Imphepho Room Spray as an insect repellent to deter mosquitoes, flies, bed bugs, ants and other creepy crawlies. Use the spray on your mattress, in your cupboards, on the curtains or wherever the insect problem is.
entry.s:tag: Pure Indigenous Wholesale Distributor South Africa

entry.title: Luck Oil Potion - Attracts Blessings & Good Luck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 41.50

Pure Indigenous's Luck Potion (20 ml) combines myth and magic, based on traditional use by our people and their powers ascribed to African folklore. This potion been mixed in organically certified cold pressed Grape Seed oil from the Cape to draw blessings and good luck.

  • Helps calm and soothe your mind
  • Allows you to acknowledge your abundance of blessings already present in your life
  • Balances your energy to allow a gateway opening for more gifts and good luck

Ingredients

  • African Helichrysum Essential Oil (Helichrysum Odoratissimum) is derived from the Greek word "helios" meaning sun and "chrysos" meaning gold, referring to the colour of the flowers in this genus. It has been used by the indigenous people throughout time in their rituals to cleanse energy and space, as well as bring upon a meditative state.
  • Cape Chamomile Essential Oil (Eriocephalus punctulatus) soothes, heals and relaxes the body and mind. It acts as a powerful anti-inflammatory with a mild sedative effect.
  • Rose-scented Geranium Essential Oil (Pelagonium Graveolens) is known as the poor people’s Rose oil as it is less expensive than the original Rose essential oil. The plant is indigenous to the Cape Province of South Africa and is extracted from the flowers. It's been used for centuries as a wound healer, to balance energies, to enhance moods and last but not least, for its sweet aromatic scents.
  • Cape Grape Seed Oil has been used for thousands of years due to its benefits of toning the skin, protecting against sun damage, and reducing the appearance of blemishes, wrinkles, and stretch marks.

Directions for use

You can use the Luck Potion as an Aromatherapy massage oil, to rub onto temples, use as a burner oil, in the bath or as a steam inhalation.

Caution: Essential oils are not recommended during pregnancy, breastfeeding or on babies/children.

entry.title: African Wormwood Essential Oil - Cough and Fever Relief
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Essential Oils
Price: 119.50

Pure Indigenous's African Wormwood Essential Oil (10ml) is believed to have magical properties, particularly as a love charm. Common uses of African Wormwood Essential Oil include relief from coughs, colds, flu, fever and headaches when inhaled. It's also widely used as an insect repellent.

  • Eases coughs, blocked nasal passages and tight chests when inhaled
  • Relieves headaches, fever and flu
  • Rids feet and shoes of bad odor 
  • Is thought to promote libido
  • Heals wounds and insect bites
  • Moth repellent and natural insecticide spray

Ingredients

  • African Wormwood Oil (Artemisia Afra), also known as wild wormwood, African wormwood, wilde-als and zengana, is named after the Greek goddess Artemis. It's a common species in South Africa and a popular medicinal plant. 

Directions for use

Place a few drops of African Wormwood Essential Oil in your shoes or socks to combat bad smell.

Use a few drops of oil with steam inhalation if you have a cold, flu, fever, cough, headache or nasal congestion.

Caution: Essential oils should not be taken internally. Add to a carrier oil as a massage oil, rub onto temples, use as a burner oil or as a steam inhalation. Essential oils are not recommended during pregnancy, breastfeeding or on babies/children.

Price: 32.00

Pure Indigenous' Tranquil Bath Salts (130g) contain carefully selected indigenous essential oils to connect with inner peace and calm.

  • Add to your bath for a relaxing and fragrant experience of indigenous South African essential oils to soothe the senses
  • Carefully selected indigenous essential oils to promote tranquility
  • Common names for tranquility: Naziphazamiso (Zulu), Ukuchulumacha (Xhosa), Rustigheid (Afrikaans)

Ingredients

African Immortelle Helichrysum (Imphepho), African Wormwood (Artemisia Afra)*, Cape
Rose Geranium and Cape Snowbush* blended with Kalahari Salt

*Certified organic

Directions for use

Sprinkle into your warm bath. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Not to be used by pregnant women.

entry.title: Happy Bath Salts | Pure Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Bath
Price: 32.00

Pure Indigenous' Happy Bath Salts (130g) contain carefully selected indigenous essential oils to elevate your mood.

  • Add to your bath for an uplifting and mood-enhancing fragrant blend
  • Connect with the warmth of the African sun and uplift your spirit
  • Common names for happiness: Injabulo (Zulu), Ulonwabo (Xhosa), Geluk (Afrikaans)

Ingredients

African Immortelle Helichrysum (Imphepho) and Cape Rose Geranium blended with Kalahari Salt

Directions for use

Sprinkle into your warm bath. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Not to be used by pregnant women.
